TopicTitle: When do you think the next update will be?

Articles.Content: Simply, when do think 1.1 (or whatever the next non-microupdate) will be released.

As always, "When it's ready." And since threads like this have caused nasty arguments in the past, I'm afraid we've had to make a forum rule against asking about/discussing version release dates ([2.3.e](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/30064-Community-Rules-October-27th-2013)). This thread will be closed now.
